Clash.NAME: Clash
Clash.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 additional [R] for each non-Attack card in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage.

Corruption.NAME: Corruption
Corruption.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, lose 2 HP and gain 3 Strength.
Corruption.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, lose 2 HP and gain 3 Strength.

Demon Form.NAME: Demon Form
Demon Form.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Skills cost 0. NL Whenever you play a Skill, Exhaust it.
Demon Form.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Skills cost 0. NL Whenever you play a Skill, Exhaust it.

Dropkick.NAME: Dropkick
Dropkick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Vulnerable, NL gain [R] and NL draw 1 card.

Heavy Blade.NAME: Heavy Strike
Heavy Blade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Strength affects this card !M! times.
Heavy Blade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Strength affects this card !M! times.

Rampage.NAME: Rampage
Rampage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this damage by !M! this combat. NL Increases by more each time it's used.

Reckless Charge.NAME: Reckless Strike
Reckless Charge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Dazed into your discard pile.

Sever Soul.NAME: Sever Soul
Sever Soul.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. Deal damage equal to !M! times that card's cost.

Sword Boomerang.NAME: Boomerang Strike
Sword Boomerang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

Whirlwind.NAME: Whirlwind Strike
Whirlwind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times.
